entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 a.m. ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 8:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
